body:
Sorry I may confused about that. I used `tcpdump` and `lsof` to diagnose the network problem and I found that there may be some error at server-end. It's nothing about the `ctxhttp` lib.

![](https://trello-attachments.s3.amazonaws.com/57ac526f246c0d92b19385de/600x165/4e639a76554beb7b0def2b9dc590a6bf/upload_12_8_2016_at_13_52_31.png)

![](https://trello-attachments.s3.amazonaws.com/57ac526f246c0d92b19385de/600x112/505f972358e1c7df7ce2c2f580889128/upload_12_8_2016_at_13_48_05.png)

The `CLOSE_WAIT` and the `tcpdump` logs show that the server did not response correctly

And I change my gist
